description: Item Model for the Choice Interaction

choices.description: The choice options for the question

prompt.description: The question prompt or item stem

keyMode.description:
What key should be displayed before choices. If undefined no  key will be displayed.

| Value    | Description
|-
| `letters`| keyed with letters 
| `numbers`| keyed with numbers

choiceMode.description:
Indicates the choices are single or multiple selection

| Value     | Description
|-
| `checkbox`| user can select multiple choices 
| `radio`   | user can  select one choice

type.description:
the feedback type

| Value    | Description
|-
| `default`| a system default value will be used for feedback, like 'correct answer' 
| `custom` | the `value` provided in the config object will be used

value.description: If using custom feedback, the value for custom feedback

correct.description: Indicates if the choice is correct

value.description: the value that will be stored if this choice is selected

label.description: the text label that will be presented to the user for this choice

feedback.description: student feedback for this choice, only shown in evaluate mode
